entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
